id: Motorcyclist dead in North Glengarry collision
paragraph: A man has died after a vehicle crashed into his motorcycle in North Glengarry, Ont., Tuesday evening.Police said the motorcycle was travelling north on County Road 20 when at around 5:13 p.m. a vehicle travelling south turned toward County Road 24 and collided with the motorcycle The motorcyclist was pronounced dead at the scene, while the driver of the vehicle was not injured, police said.The victim has been identified as 59-year-old Andrew Chisholm of North Glengarry.A section of County Road 20 and County Road 24 in North Glengarry Township was closed to traffic until about 1 a.m.Ontario Provincial Police are investigating.Audience Relations, CBC P.O.
